drupal_development.title: Drupal Development
drupal_development.description: Do you have an old or the latest Drupal? There’s nothing impossible to implement. We specialize in Drupal development, providing complete teams and project management.

drupal_support.title: Drupal 7 Support After EOL
drupal_support.description: We support old codebases in Drupal 7. With decades of experience, our team ensures your system remains secure and reliable.

project_management.title: Project Management
project_management.description: We provide 360-degree project management from planning to delivery, with skilled project managers, scrum masters, and developers, offering complete teams and solutions.

it_consultancy.title: IT Consultancy
it_consultancy.description: Are you stuck? We value honesty and efficiency. If we’re not the right solution or you need something else, we’ll tell you straight without any hassle or time-wasting.

about.title: About Us
about.slogan: Where others give up, we start from there.
about.details: We specialize in taking on the hardest jobs—tasks no one else wants or is able to do. Old, legacy systems? Spaghetti code? Bad architecture? We are your solution. With more than 20 years of experience in coding, consulting, and project management, we provide honest opinions and actionable insights.
about.values: Our core values are honesty, professional service, and a business mindset focused on driving your success.
